# 2025 Dwars door Vlaanderen

| second             = Wout van Aert

The 2025 Dwars door Vlaanderen was a road cycling one-day race that took place on 2 April 2025, starting in Roeselare and finishing in Waregem, both in West Flanders. This was the 79th edition of Dwars door Vlaanderen and the 13th event of the 2025 UCI World Tour. Matteo Jorgenson was the defending champion after winning the 2024 edition by 29 seconds.
Teams
All eighteen UCI WorldTeams and seven UCI ProTeams participated in the race. Defending champion Matteo Jorgenson looked to retain his crown, while the only other previous winner in the peloton was his Vismaâ€“Lease a Bike team-mate Dylan Van Baarle.
